name: Remember the cards
description:
The game features 8 collections for memorization and 20 cards in each of them. At the beginning of each round, cards are shown for memorization. There can be 4, 6, 8 or 12 cards to memorize, depending on the difficulty.

After that, we take additional cards that were not on the table. The player will be shown cards one by one and asked if there was a card on the table or not. The player gets coins for correct answers, and loses health points for mistakes.

Use coins to unlock additional decks and new difficulty levels. At the moment, collections have been added to the game: characters, bags, food, necklaces, monsters, rings, sketches, coats of arms.
